      void Site.getReadLock(Transaction trans, java.lang.String index)
      the transaction takes the read lock on the index
      void Site.getWriteLock(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String index)
      transaction takes the write lock on the index
      boolean Site.isReadLockAvailable(java.lang.String index, Transaction transaction)
      checks if read lock can be acquired on the index
      boolean Site.isWriteLockAvailable(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String index)
      checks if a write lock can be taken by the transaction on the index
      boolean Site.isWriteLockTaken(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String index)
      returns true if transaction already has a write lock on the index false otherwise
      boolean Site.transactionAbortsOnWrite(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String index, java.util.List<WaitOperation> waitingOperations)
      checks if a transaction should wait for the other transaction to finish or it should abort
      boolean Site.transactionWaits(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String index)
      checks if a transaction should wait for the other transaction to finish
